remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
sbc3ie.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
sbc3ie.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
sbc3ie.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
sbc3ie.4 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbc3ie $p |- ( [. A / x ]. [. B / y ]. [. C / z ]. ph <-> ps ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
$d ps x y z $.
